title: This meta blows
body: We need more picks im tired of watching LCS and seeing the same bot lanes the same jungles can we have some diversity i mean ik its meta but still some diversity

replies.body:
But...but... all ADCs are super strong according to most top lane mains and are busted right now...which is why they are obviously picking the most busted two {{champion:110}} {{champion:22}} 

We for sure need assistance in making the ADC class more viable, it would help not having just two ADCs in every LCS match. I think we should make them super good at objective control and less on team fight potential since keystones are sticking around pretty strongly.

It really does. It's not just the current pool of meta champs either. It's how the game flows overall this season. Games seem to be decided by the 10-12 minute mark, and recovering from a bad early-game is all but impossible. It's too easy to establish a huge gold lead over the team that falls behind. The Jungle now forces a specific playstyle due to longer respawn times on the camps, as well. Bot lane now, more than ever, is pretty much decided based on how oppressive the support is. Top is just as boring and uneventful as ever.
Yeah i feel that i just want to see different champs in competitive play im tired of seeing just varus ashe zyra and malz
It will only be good once they play EVERY champ or at least 100

theres always gonna a tier list. One champ is always better than another. Its like playing Madden and wondering why everybody uses the top 2 teams all the time. or 2k. same thing man. there's always somebody that pulls out the Bills in Madden or Galio in Ranked, but all games will always be like that.
